body.name: Nellie's Dishwasher Powder - Tough on Food Residue, Plant-Based Ingredients, Septic Safe, Spotless Clean, High-Efficiency Dishwashing Solution - 100 Scoop Tin

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 29 mins
features: Exceptional Grease Removal: Nellie's Dishwasher Powder is your ally against grease, food particles, and more, leaving your plates immaculate. Impress your guests with gleaming dishes, demonstrating a level of clean that goes beyond the ordinary and adding a touch of sophistication to your dining experiences.

Gentle on the Environment: Elevate your dishwashing game with Nellie's Dishwasher Powder. This biodegradable, septic-safe, and phosphate-free formula showcases your commitment to environmental stewardship while delivering remarkable cleaning results. Let your dishes shine as a reflection of your eco-friendly choices.

Nature's Cleaning Power: Immerse your dishes in nature's cleaning power with Nellie's Dish Powder. As a plant-based solution, it exudes both cleaning prowess and eco-friendliness. Experience spotless results without compromising your values, ensuring a harmonious relationship with both cleanliness and sustainability.

Effortless Measured Cleaning: Nellie's Dishwasher Powder in the 100 Scoop Tin brings not just remarkable cleaning but also convenience. Each scoop offers the right amount, ensuring every load receives the perfect cleaning boost without any guesswork. Elevate your dishwashing experience with efficiency and precision.

Clean Plates, Clean Conscience: Achieve sparkling clean plates and a clear conscience with Nellie's Dishwasher Powder. Its biodegradable nature means that every wash contributes to a cleaner environment, merging practicality with environmental responsibility. Feel the satisfaction of spotless dishes and sustainable living.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #16,813 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #65 in Dishwasher Detergent

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mother-in-law coming for dinner? Don’t worry. Nellie’s Dish Powder easily penetrates grease, food particles & more, leaving every plate spotless! So spotless, that she might even stay for dinner! Sorry about that. Our Dish Powder is a plant-based formula and kind to the environment. So, the only gross stuff going down the drain will come from your plates! What’s not to love about doing dishes!

How To Use: Use the hottest water available (60°C-70°C/140°F-150°F). Fill detergent cups as recommended by machine manufacturer. If machine has no cup dispenser, place 1 tablespoon in bottom of dishwasher for average load of dishes. More powder may be required in hard water areas; soft water may require less.

Ingredients: Sodium Chloride, Sodium Carbonate, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Percarbonate, Sodium Metasilicate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Silicate, Protease. Our formula keeps the environment as spotless as your dishes!

Nellie's Story Nellie’s was inspired by, you guessed it, Nellie! She was a real person with real values. She believed in honesty and simplicity, and she was going green long before the color was cool. It’s these beliefs that made us love the Nellie name, which is why we’ve developed a line of cleaning products to honor her. Every dryerball, fragrance stick and laundry nugget is free of irritating toxins and phosphates, creating a hypoallergenic experience. Our items help keep the environment as spotless as your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dishwashing powder
reviews.reviewText: I love that I don't have to worry about this messing up my septic. So glad I made the change. Gets dishes squeaky clean, does not leave any residue. Comes in a cute tin, so it's not an eyesore to leave on the counter and no box or plastic waste. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Recently I’ve noticed my dishwasher packets weren’t dissolving thoroughly and there was detergent residue left behind. Couldn’t find a problem with the machine. Have used Nellie’s laundry soda for years. Happy to find the same quality for the dishwasher - dissolving completely, clean dishwasher, clean dishes. All is well again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fragrance-free solution & works with hard water
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for an effective fragrance-free and more eco-friendly dishwasher powder or pod for a while and tried many different products, and I'm happy to finally land on this one. I was optimistic since I tried their laundry detergent, and it's been working great for months now, so I hoped their dishwashing powder would work just as well. I was still a little skeptical since I have very hard water here in Arizona and other dishwasher powders and pods (even Cascade) would leave white residue and forced me to have to use an extra rinse aid to get them clean. But I'm happy to say that after trying Nellie's powder (even without a rinse aid!) they come out just as clean, and even better it doesn't leave any gross strong-smelling soap fragrance on my dishes. Great price too for the amount you get - I'll definitely be buying the larger quantity once I run out. Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work better than other detergents
reviews.reviewText: The pods one would buy at a regular store we’re leaving my dishes smelling and tasting all chemically and not doing a great job cleaning either. This seems to work better, though I have to use a scoop and a half.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never use regular dishwasher soap again.
reviews.reviewText: Really great product! Cleans dishes very well with very little to no residue. Does not leave a God-awful chemical scent on your dishes or silicone utensils like petroleum-based Cascade or Palmolive. I'm never going back to those nasty detergents again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't clean at all
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this stuff because I love the laundry soda. This is stuff just work at all. I had tried adding more, adding less, absolutely rinsing everything off before putting the items in the dishwasher, and using the hottest setting possible with an extra rinse setting and my dishes never come out clean. There is a film on them and they feel just gritty and dirty. Glass is cloudy and weird looking after using this stuff. I have never had a problem with any other dishwashing soda, or detergent. Will be returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this stuff is great!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. i love this stuff. i was looking for a natural alternative to typical dish washing detergents because 1. im highly sensitive to artificial fragrances and 2. it doesnt contain any chemicals that could potentially be harmful to my family.its so easy to use. it gets our dishes sparkling. there is absolutely no weird smell to our dishes, and no streaks!!! i love this stuff. and it helps that my dogs name is nellie too.i bought a jar to keep it in bc of the aesthetic but it is still easy to use while still in the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: works well, goes a long way. no complaints, have been using for month. worth the price
No microplastics is why I switched to this product which lives up to it's promise of being eco friendly and it works very well, especially with 1/4 scoop added as rinse aid.
It's a wonderful product! I am very sensitive to scents and this one works great for me! With my dishwasher and water softener I only need half of the scoop and the dishes are always sparkly clean!

I’ve been using this for a week or two now in my dishwasher and have no complaints. Gets everything clean and it smells nice and fresh. Does a good job even on the greasiest of dishes. Does the trick without any of the toxic chemicals prevalent in other mainstream dishwasher detergents. I would recommend this product and will keep buying.
This dishwasher soap was recommended by the fellow who installed our Miele dishwasher. It has been just fine, dishes come clean and no complaints.

I tried this soap on my previous Samsung water wall dishwasher. Did not clean so well. It turns out Samsung just makes crappy dishwashers and require soaps with harsh chemicals to do most of the work. Upgraded to a Bosch 300 series and tried the soap again and it cleans 90% as well as the big brand name dish soaps with all the harsh chemicals. This soap does have a tougher time with dried stuck on food when dishes are left overnight sitting on the counter. Running a soak/rinse cycle prior to washing helps a lot for those situations. For the most part this soap has no strong perfumes and leaves glass wear sparkling. When I use this soap I run on Heavy setting with Sanitize + Extra dry and results are great even with heavy greasy dishes. For Dried stuck on foods this soap will struggle a bit.
